subject: one of the best wikipedia entries i've ever read
body: i'm thankful that ec, when asked the other day about the most interesting fact she knew, immediately went into telling the story of tarrare, which may or may not be factual but is [one of the best wikipedia entries i've ever read](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarrare).
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful that ec, when asked the other day about the most interesting fact she knew, immediately went into telling the story of tarrare, which may or may not be factual but is [one of the best wikipedia entries i've ever read](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarrare).
